details.description: Hugo is Sector Comms Manager at Telefónica Dynamic Insights. Before Telefónica Hugo worked for global media giants Vice and MTV, and previously in advertising and Digital Agencies, in Lisbon, Madrid and London. From digital project management and social media pioneering to Digital strategy and Account Direction, he's consistently integrated new trends in Digital strategies and evangelized new trends like social media, content marketing and social enterprise, while finding new ways to measure and prove their value and relevance. He is now leading Marketing and Communications for the Big Data team Dynamic Insights, and working on the global rollout of their new insights products. Hugo is focused in building the messages that will enable big data to fulfill its potential and creating a more open and collaborative environment between all the global market stakeholders. The focus on CSR and Digital confidence play a key role in this but in the end it’s all about making sure this new business is understood and value not only generated but also perceived in a transparent way.
